name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Quality Assurance Engineer with 13+ years of experience ensuring high-quality application delivery across the healthcare and financial sectors. Proficient in **C#**, **Java**, **Unity**, **iOS**, **Android**, and adept at using **AWS Device Farm**, **Kobiton**, and **Unity Test Runner** for effective testing and quality assurance processes. Skilled in CI/CD practices leveraging **Jenkins** and **Azure DevOps** to streamline deployment and enhance product quality. 

Expertise in debugging, problem-solving, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to create robust testing strategies. Strong background in developing testing frameworks and methodologies for enhancing application performance, complemented by a commitment to communication and collaboration across all project stages.
